price: 56. Si ayan nafi u odhan12: Alla waxaan ku gabood falay oo ka gaabiyey caabudidda Alle, waxaana ka mid ahaa kuwa ku jees-jeesa (Xaqa).
arabic: أَن تَقُولَ نَفۡسٞ يَٰحَسۡرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِي جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّٰخِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: an taqūla nafsun yāḥasratā ʿalā mā farraṭtu fī janbi al-lahi wa-in kuntu lamina al-sākhirīna
